# Note Component

### Note

**Exports:**
- `Note` - Note/alert component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Note } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<div class="w-full flex gap-8">
    <Note size="small">A small note</Note>
    <Note>A default note</Note>
    <Note size="large">A large note</Note>
</div>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/note for full documentation and examples.
